titleStmt.title: The secret policy of the Iansenists, and the present state of the Sorbon. Discovered by a doctour of that faculty, who having learnt Iansenisme when he studied divinity, vnder a master that taught it there publickly, has been since disabused, & followes the Catholick party. / Translated out of the French copie.
Secrette politiqve des Iansenistes et l'estat present de la Sorbonne de Paris. English
titleStmt.author: Deschamps, Etienne Agard.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Christian Roman, at the Sign of True Faith near the great Church.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Sign of True Faith near the great Church.
